overview: Bumbling Detective Brooks (Asa Akira) and her very tightly wound partner (Michael Vegas) are on the trail of a dangerous serial killer. Brooks must go undercover at the local strip club in a last ditch effort to lure out the murderer. The plan works a little too well though, and the hunter becomes the hunted in this hilarious crime comedy.
tagline: She's hot on the trail of a serial killer... But Clueless.
title: The Blonde Dahlia
